summary: System operating with mock data. pH levels appear low, TDS elevated beyond recommended range. Temperature stable.

insights.recommendation: Check pH probe calibration and consider adding pH buffer solution to raise levels to 6.6-7.2 range

insights.risk: High - TDS above recommended freshwater range
insights.recommendation: Reduce nutrient concentration and increase water changes to bring TDS down to 200-500 ppm range
Continue monitoring. Temperature is suitable for most freshwater fish species
